TextView.android:text: Each year about 1.3 billion tons of food is wasted and at the same time about 800 million people do not have access to sufficient and nutritious food (Global Food Banking Network). This figure represents roughly one third of food produced for human consumption. Food can be either lost or wasted throughout the supply chain, from initial agricultural production down to final household consumption. Food wastage is not only an indication of hunger, but also of many economic problems.nstead of wasting food we can put them in use by donating them to various organizations such as orphanages, old age homes, etc. Ywaste Mobile Application,as its name might suggest, is a social application designed to provide the necessary information for people to take the initiative and support each other.
